resources.string: Get ready to go in less than 5 minutes.\nPair your device and you\'re set!
Tiresome long drives are no more a worry.\nYou can know when to take a break!
Let your friends know.\nSet any contact as your emergency number!
Tell us your name.\nIt will help while sending alerts to your\nemergency contacts.
To see the slider again, go to Settings -> Welcome Screen

1. Set your emergency contact from your contact list through the option in the main menu. 

2. Make sure your phone's Bluetooth and GPS are turned on. 

3. Pair your phone to raspberrypi through Bluetooth. You can use Device Status option in the main menu to check the pairing. 

4. If you are detected to be slightly tired, your device will alert your by blinking LED lights and beeping. 

5. If you seem extremely sleepy, your phone will send three SMSs to your emergency contact, spaced by 5 minutes each, containing your current location.

Dos 

1. Keep your device powered on at all times to prevent mishaps. 
2. Your phone must remain paired for remote alerts to be functional. 

Don'ts 

1. Avoid wearing sunglasses, scarves or any other apparel that occlude your eyes and mouth. 
2. Do not move the position of the device after installation.
